column4: I have a frozen computer.  I was trying to open a pdf and now I have a black screen, cursor at top right (not flashing) and stuck mouse.  Help
hit ctrl+alt+f1
see if you can atleast get a terminal login
ctrl+alt+f1-f6 should be text terminals f7 is X
do you have ssh installed on the machine?
no
hrm.. power cycle it is
could be if data isn't saved etc... but what else can you do at this point? try hittign ctrl+alt+del and see if it will initiate a reboot on its on.
what is the problem? random lockups?
did 9.10 or previous versions have lockups?
ahh how old is your computer?
usaually random lockups are power related. I've disabled acpi on some boxes that had random freezing and problems went away
edit the /etc/default/grub file and look for GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="quiet splash" chagne it to "quiet splash acpi=off
I would also runa  memtest on the box
I edited that file, now do I need to recompile grub file?
sudo update-grub2
then do I restart?
sudo reboot
or sudo shutdown -r now
just want to make sure that my comp should be able to run 10.04 right?
possible kind of have to figure otu what the issue is first to make that assumption
well i've made the changes and rebooted so now I'll just have to play with it for a while and see if it has any problems
yeap
